review: I love this!!! I've had it for a little over a week and it's great (I have access to Netflix, Hulu, Showtime, and HBO accounts.) It turned my 50" flat screen into a smart TV! I'll show you all a Pros vs. Cons list though, for the hesistant shoppers:PROS* Easy setup (literally plug it into the HDMI port, plug the other end into the USB, connect to wifi and you're golden)* So many movies/tv shows/channels I don't think I'll ever watch them all* Diversity in movie and TV options (Action, News, Sports, Lady channels, etc.)* Sling TV (live TV with a free 2 week package, then $20/month, with only a wifi connection)* Free initial seasons of popular HBO shows (i.e. Six Feet Under, True Blood, etc.)CONS* Unless you already have a Netflix, Hulu, Showtime, HBO Go accounts, it's not as fun. The movies available through Prime are a little bit better than the ones offered through Netflix, but not by much*The games are pretty boring, but I didn't buy it for the games. If you're looking for better games, buy the Amazon Fire TV packageOverall, I'm very happy with my purchase and I look forward to watching TV for the rest of the summer!!
